lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You haven't been in high school for very long and you have gotten lost in the halls. You ask another, older student if he knows where your class is.
Because your social skills are so good, you have no trouble gaining sympathy and getting directions to your class.
Because your social skills are not very well-developed, you have trouble gaining sympathy from the older student, who sends you on a wild goose chase.
